meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek pottery vessel with a spout and handle.
meanings.sent1: The askos was used to pour liquids in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful askos displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The askos thought it was a teapot and tried to pour tea.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of askos vessels overflowed with history and artistry.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the askos made it a prized possession.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'asko', meaning a type of ancient Greek pottery vessel with a spout and handle.
meanings.sent1: Many askos were found during the archaeological dig.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a whole section dedicated to askos.
meanings.sent3: The askos gathered for a meeting to discuss their spouts.
meanings.sent4: The askos in the room clinked together like a symphony of history.
meanings.sent5: Each of the askos had a unique story to tell.
